title: The Use of measuring instruments: the volumetric flask
creator_credit: Australian Teaching Films, Craig Baynes and L.M. Simmons
brief_description: The standard method of using a volumetric flask; warning against placing hot liquid in a flask; pouring liquid into the flask; using a pipette to add liquid; storing liquid in a reagent bottle.
